author: ziad_ghali
content:
While my journey to understand Go-Ethereum Project, I already read its documentation and already install the Project and try to call some commands for it but I found the project is really BIG, and by chance found this Repo with PDF material explaining the geth project structure with some code exploring, I recommend it and I am open for any discussion about it 
https://github.com/miguelmota/ethereum-development-with-go-book
